comment: Theres a couple different things going on here. JF wants pro-whites to be libertarian, so lots of his critiques were good but its only because tucker didnt go far enough. trs only hears what they want to. They want to amplify a message I agree with, a more pro-worker nationalism but tucker got btfod by his own superficial anti-corporate stances

comment: yep, JF is a lolbert so I usually don't listen but sometimes he'll have a good guest. That said he does do a good debate analysis, he was pretty spot on with the Tucker debate. I don't think Tucker is hiding his power level like TRS suggests.
